snippet.title: Java Program Example: Add Two Numbers From a User
snippet.description:
New course coming soon! Learn Java Fast launches on July 1st, 2020. Stay informed and join the waitlist: https://course.alexlorenlee.com/courses/learn-java-fast

- This Java program will take two numbers from a user and add them together! ✅ Java program examples like this should make it easier for you to learn java.

👑Start practicing now with 10 free java programs - http://alexlorenlee.com/
🌅 Source Code - https://github.com/alexlorenlee/JavaTutorialCode/blob/master/Programs/AddUserInput.java

All you need to do is this: 5 + 10 just like in a calculator. Put that in a print statement like this: System.out.println(5 + 10); and you will see the addition printed to the screen. However, we can ask the user for the two numbers and do the exact same thing to make a simple java program to add two numbers from the user.

The plus sign in programming can be tricky... It acts differently with numbers and strings, but you'll surely get the hang of it! They aren't too bad :) If you followed along, congrats! You learned-by-doing!

I hope you enjoyed this tutorial on how to make a java program to add two numbers taking input from user! I like to have a nice mix of tutorials and actual projects for you all :)

Do you want to learn how to code from scratch, in Java? Check out my Java Tutorial For Beginners: https://youtu.be/woJb2hAfkO0

Was this java program helpful to you? -

Free tips and programs: http://alexlorenlee.com
